pages.title: Casing
pages.text: Casing blocks are the building blocks of the Energizer.$(br2)They are required to build its frame and faces, and are also used to craft the other parts.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() they are required to build the frame and the faces$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
